name: StumbleUpon - Ultra-Compact Toolbar
description: Hide the overflow menu, unnecessary dropmarkers, "First Rater" icon (when present), and a couple of separators to make the StumbleUpon toolbar more compact. (When you've already turned off most of the icons, the overflow menu, combined with SU's resizing semantics, is really just a waste of space)
